title: My name is Leah. What would my name be if I was a boy? - Quora

response.answer_text: From Hebrew, it might’ve meant “weary” or “cow”. Not sure what the male equivalents of those are, though. Going another way, as a boy, you might’ve simply gone as Lee. Looking at Lee, I found this…From a surname that was derived from Old English leah meaning "clearing". So yeah, Lee came from the Old English form of Leah, so I’ll say that Lee is the right answer.
Anything you like. It's YOUR name. You get to change it if you don't like it. ❤
